# oisst

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `oisst` is to easily download [Optimum Interpolation Sea Surface Temperature (OISST)](https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/oisst) data hosted by National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA). 

## Installation

``` r
remotes::install_github("andybeet/oisst")
```

## Usage

To download a single years data (year 2001 in example) into a folder called "output" within your current directory

``` r
oisst::get_oisst_data(years=2001,outputStructure=NULL,outputDir=here::here("output"))

```
